title: Servers are  crap....
body: So ya i have been playing league for the last 2 weeks and man oh man im telling you something is wrong with this game now not to brag but my rig is pretty dope and i have the best internet available were i live but i cant quite wrap my arm around wtf is wrong with there servers... like give me a break in a game and i dc there should be zero of that for me..but you know what instead of trying to make money why dont you focus on trying to improve your servers and work on that don't worry about skins so much and who needs the newest thing because this just dose not do i want to enjoy my game not have it shit on me all the time if i could talk face to face with Mr. Brandon Beck and Mr. Marc Merrill i would tell them they need to work on some things to get this stuff up right also what happened to forgiveness in the old days man were is your human morals..like my god...fix your servers...

replies.body:
First, what is your ping and packet loss to the servers.
Second, what is your ISP.
Third, what sort of LAN connection are you using?

I doubt that it is the servers singeling you out for torture, more likely it is your ISP, regional internet infrastructure, or local network (having a "dope" rig and "fast" internet does not mean it is not horribly misconfigured or unsuitable)
I guess but my ping is always 50 or less im hardwired and i dont get a pocket loss shaw is my service provider so yes it is riot that is having issues..
